heroSubtitle: QA Engineering • Automation • Cybersecurity • Generative AI
paragraphs: I'm a dedicated professional with expertise in QA engineering, automation, cybersecurity, and generative AI. With a passion for ensuring software quality and security, I've spent the last decade developing and implementing innovative solutions for complex technical challenges.

My approach combines technical precision with creative problem-solving, allowing me to deliver exceptional results across diverse industries. I'm committed to staying at the forefront of technological advancements, particularly in the rapidly evolving field of AI.
